description: A fun part of a balanced breakfast and bursting with fruity flavor, Kelloggs Froot Loops is a delicious breakfast cereal both kids and adults love. Just as nutritious as it is delicious, Kellogg's Froot Loops breakfast cereal provides an excellent source of 8 vitamins and minerals, is low fat, and contains no high-fructose corn syrup. Not just for breakfast, Kellogg's Froot Loops breakfast cereal is a tasty addition to any meal or snack any time of the day. Pack a snack for school, an afternoon pick-me-up, a post-workout treat, or a late-night bowlful of sweet, crunchy breakfast cereal. Kellogg's Froot Loops breakfast cereal also makes a great addition to your favorite yogurt or as the base for a homemade trail mix; the mouthwatering options are endless. Just add your favorite milk or enjoy as a treat straight from the box. - Bursting with fruity flavor, Kelloggs Froot Loops cereal is a delicious way to wake up and start your day - Crispy O's combine with your favorite fruit flavors for a tasty cereal both kids and adults love; Crafted to help bring energy and smiles to busy mornings - Excellent source of 8 vitamins and minerals per serving; Low fat; Contains no high fructose corn syrup; Kosher Pareve; Contains wheat ingredients - Pack a small bag for a tasty snack at work, an afternoon pick-me-up at school, or enjoy as a late-night treat; Stow in a bag in lunchboxes, totes, and backpacks - Contains 1, 27-ounce box of delicious Kellogg's Froot Loops cereal; Packaged for freshness and great taste

name: Quaker Life Cinnamon Multigrain Cereal
description: LIFE Cinnamon Multigrain Cereal offers a wholesome breakfast treat with just the right touch of sweetness and a lively touch of cinnamon. Each square is made with whole grain oats, whole wheat, and other grains .

name: Quaker Life Original Multigrain Cereal
description: You don't have to be a kid to love the sweet and crunchy goodness of Quaker Life Cereal, and you don't have to be a grown-up to enjoy the whole grain Quaker Oats and wheat baked inside each square. Wholesome with just the right touch of sweetness, Quaker Life Cereal is a healthy, delicious choice for everyone.
